tool_description: Parses and structures manufacturer maintenance requirements into actionable rules with conditions, intervals, and dependencies.

vehicle_profile_id.description: Vehicle profile identifier from Vehicle Profile Creator

error_messages: Invalid vehicle profile: Vehicle profile ID not found or invalid.
Malformed specifications: Unable to parse manufacturer maintenance specifications.
Unsupported operating conditions: Use one of [normal, severe, extreme].
Conflicting rules: Found contradictory maintenance intervals in specifications.
usage: Input vehicle profile ID and manufacturer specifications. The tool creates structured maintenance rules with proper intervals and conditions.

rule_count.description: Total number of parsed maintenance rules
